__e: My grandfather told me once that back on Earth you couldn't stare at the sun without hurting your eyes.
Your Grace. If my father had seen the things that I've seen, he'd also tell you to burn the dead before nightfall.
I have a job to do. I just want to know why we had to cremate the bodies.
I told you to find the evidence and destroy it, not torch a dead man's house.
If you tell me to murder somebody, then I have to do it? Yes. Keep it coming.
If you burn down the house, it'll be gone.
He must be a mad dog to shoot a goddamn good-looing gal like that in the head.
Not one of yöu possesses what it takes.... ..To actually put a bullet in the back of that woman's head.
Stay still long enough for me to blow your brains out.
If you burn down the house, it'll be gone.
If you tell me to murder somebody, then I have to do it? Yes. Keep it coming.
Did you by any chance, also set the car on fire?
- The old man said destroy the head and burn the body.
You remember what your beautiful son looked like before you burned half his face off?
I will. But, trust me, you don't want dinner to burn.
I should fucking burn in hell for what I said to you.
As God is my witness, may I burn in hell forever... if I ever killed anybody.
No, I'd be burning in hell if it wasn't for your lot.
As God is my witness, may I burn in hell forever... if I ever killed anybody.
You can't keep it burning over the long haul.
You better follow him, or I'll burn you alive.
I've got the right to burn old stuff.
- I'm assuming. Does the little wax lion ever tell you to burn things or hurt people?
You have no right to burn books!
I'm not getting burnt twice, sweetheart.
...and I was afraid of burning again, so I couldn't say no so we did it.
Do you know what it is to burn from the inside?
